name: Cybernetic Eye, Telescopic (TL-10)
description:
Telescopic vision allows magnification similar to telescopic binoculars, with zoom controlled by eyeball pressure (which is manipulated by squinting). This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
